abstract.t: The IESG has identified several security issues with thecurrent Mobile IPv6 specification [MIPv6]. A subsequent effort[MIPv6SecReq] details the security threats introduced byMIPv6. Two major issues are (1) how to obtain a securityassociation between an arbitrary MN and CN such that thebinding update (BU) is secure, and, assuming such a mechanismis in place, (2) how to secure the individual BU messages.This document is an assessment of the proposed solutions forproblem (1).
